messages.content: Can you help me draft a letter to my landlord at 4522 Oak Lane, Austin, TX 78701? I'm moving out early.
I can help with that. Are you breaking the lease or is there a specific clause you're using?
Breaking it. I just got a new job at Tesla and need to relocate. My name is Alex Rivera and my email is a.rivera.dev@gmail.com if you want to put that in the signature.
I've been feeling really dizzy lately and have a ringing in my ears. Could it be related to my blood pressure medication?
I'm an AI, not a doctor. Tinnitus and dizziness can be side effects of certain medications. You should consult a professional.
I'll call my doctor, Dr. Sarah Jenkins, tomorrow at 555-019-2234. I'm just worried because I'm 6 months pregnant.
What's the best way to save for a wedding? We are looking at a $30k budget for next summer.
High-yield savings accounts or short-term CDs are great options. Have you started a specific budget plan?
Not yet. My fianc√©e, Jessica Miller, and I are just starting to look at venues in Colorado. We also need to fix our credit scores first.
I'm trying to set up a home server but I can't access it remotely. My IP is 192.168.1.15 but my public one is 72.14.201.55.
You likely need to configure port forwarding on your router for port 80 or 443.
Tried that. Also, is it safe to store a CSV of my employees' SSNs on a local drive? Example format: 000-12-3456.
Compare the fuel economy of a 2024 Toyota RAV4 Hybrid vs a Honda CR-V Hybrid.
The RAV4 Hybrid generally gets about 41 city / 38 highway, while the CR-V Hybrid is slightly lower at 40 city / 34 highway.
I think I'll go with the Toyota. My current lease on my 2021 Corolla ends in May and I need more room for my photography gear.
Can you summarize the best MBA programs for part-time students in Chicago?
Booth (UChicago) and Kellogg (Northwestern) have top-tier part-time programs, followed by DePaul and Loyola.
Thanks. I'm applying this fall. My GPA was 3.8 at Michigan State. Do I need to include my home address (1201 N State St, Chicago) on the application?
